meta.job_title: Lead Quality Assurance Technician – Document Control

duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing the revision, issuance, and tracking of controlled documents used to support the manufacture of bulk and sterile fill biologics.
Conducting internal audits of systems and documents to ensure compliance to applicable policies and SOPs.
Supporting regulatory and client audits/inspections of the organization.
Working closely with various departments to resolve quality issues and offer assistance as needed.
Processing, distributing, and maintaining controlled documentation using a document control system.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED. 6+ years’ experience with Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs) in the pharmaceutical, biologic or medical device industries in a Document Control position.
